synopsis:
1st year work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director : Eri KINOSHITA
Music : Soyoka HAYASHI
Sound effects : Ayano KITAZONO
producer : Mitsuko OKAMOTO

One day when I came home, I found my mother become a cat. Unfamiliar appearance of the parents confuses the child. Yet, the time of the parents and child passes quietly like a spring breeze.

(Source: YouTube)
